edu.mills.freeingourselves

Class FreeingOurselvesDatabaseUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mills.freeingourselves.FreeingOurselvesDatabaseUtilities

  • final class FreeingOurselvesDatabaseUtilities
extends Object
    Provides a simple interface to the database. Activities should call the methods in this class rather than accessing the database directly.

    • Method Detail

      • getResources

        static ArrayList<String> getResources(android.content.Context context)
        Gets a list of the resources. Each String contains the resource name followed by " - " and the resource description. If a database error occurs, null is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        list of resources or null if there is an error

      • getResourceLink

        static String getResourceLink(android.content.Context context,
                              int id)
        Gets the link of a resource based on its position. If a database error occurs, null is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        id - the resource id
        Returns:
        resource link or null if there is an error

      • getWorkoutNames

        static ArrayList<String> getWorkoutNames(android.content.Context context)
        Gets a list of the workout names. If a database error occurs, null is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        list of workout names or null if there is an error

      • getSpecificWorkout

        static android.database.Cursor getSpecificWorkout(android.content.Context context,
                                                  int id)
        Gets all information for a specific workout. The columns of the returned cursor are:
        1. name (String)
        2. details (String)
        3. picture_file (String)
        4. count (int)
        5. fave (int, 0 or 1)
        The caller is responsible for closing the returned cursor. If a database error occurs, null is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        id - the workout id
        Returns:
        all information for a specific workout or null if there is an error

      • updateWorkoutFavorite

        static boolean updateWorkoutFavorite(android.content.Context context,
                                     int id,
                                     boolean isFavorite)
        Updates the favorite column for a specific workout. If a database error occurs, false is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        id - the workout ID
        isFavorite - whether the workout is favorited
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • updateWorkoutCount

        static boolean updateWorkoutCount(android.content.Context context,
                                  int id)
        Updates the count for a specific workout. If a database error occurs, false is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        id - the workout ID
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • getFaveWorkouts

        static android.database.Cursor getFaveWorkouts(android.content.Context context)
        Gets all information for all favorite workouts. The columns of the returned cursor are:
        1. id (int)
        2. name (String)
        The caller is responsible for closing the returned cursor. If a database error occurs, null is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        all information for all favorite workouts or null if there is an error

      • getHealthCareQuestions

        static ArrayList<String> getHealthCareQuestions(android.content.Context context)
        Gets a list of the healthcare questions. If a database error occurs, null is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        list of healthcare questions or null if there is an error

      • getSpecificHealthcareQuestion

        static android.database.Cursor getSpecificHealthcareQuestion(android.content.Context context,
                                                             int id)
        Gets all information for a specific healthcare question. The columns of the returned cursor are:
        1. step_info (String)
        2. notes (String)
        3. saved (int, 0 or 1)
        The caller is responsible for closing the returned cursor. If a database error occurs, null is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        id - the question id
        Returns:
        all information for a specific healthcare question or null if there is an error

      • healthcareIsSaved

        static boolean healthcareIsSaved(android.content.Context context,
                                 int id)
        Checks whether a healthcare question is marked as saved. If a database error occurs, a "health table error" message is logged; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        id - the healthcare question ID
        Returns:
        true if saved, false if not

      • updateNotes

        static boolean updateNotes(android.content.Context context,
                           int id,
                           String notes)
        Updates the note column for a specific healthcare question. If a database error occurs, false is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        id - the healthcare question ID
        notes - the notes to add
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • updateSaved

        static boolean updateSaved(android.content.Context context,
                           int id,
                           boolean isSaved)
        Updates the saved column for a specific healthcare question. If a database error occurs, false is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        id - the healthcare question ID
        isSaved - whether the workout is favorited
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • getSavedHealthcare

        static android.database.Cursor getSavedHealthcare(android.content.Context context)
        Gets all information for all favorite healthcare questions. The columns of the returned cursor are:
        1. id (int)
        2. step_info (String)
        3. notes (String)
        The caller is responsible for closing the returned cursor. If a database error occurs, null is returned; the caller will need to handle this case.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        all information for all favorite healthcare questions or null if there is an error
